divs: Sighting DetailsMy friend and I were driving around and noticed 2 lights in the sky that wernt there before, we pulled the car over to watch them, as we took out our camera one of them dissapeared..The other one stayed as we took pictures, after a few minutes the one that had dissapeared had come back..we watched them hover and move around as we were taking pictures another one came into view. We watched them for around 15 minutes before they left
